solution_line_template: The total number of books is {whale_books} books + {fish_books} books = <<{whale_books}+{fish_books}={total_books}>>{total_books} books.
The cost of the books is ${book_cost}/book × {total_books} books = $<<{book_cost}*{total_books}={total_book_cost}>>{total_book_cost}.
The cost of the magazines is ${magazine_cost}/magazine × {num_magazines} magazines = $<<{magazine_cost}*{num_magazines}={total_magazine_cost}>>{total_magazine_cost}.
